name: Cops & Robbers (itch) (fearlesslemur, canyon97, C-C Studio, mgcgamer, falandrof)
name_original: Cops & Robbers (itch) (fearlesslemur, canyon97, C-C Studio, mgcgamer, falandrof)
description: We designed a simple game of high-stakes hide-and-seek. You, a self-proclaimed robber, must infiltrate a local bank for a large payload: a shiny gem is being kept inside the vaults. Be careful, though! The bank employs an observant guard to help defend the gem from theft.
